room_title: Escape room "Al Capone’s Revenge" by Xscape Factor in Fayetteville
review: OMGoodness! This place was awesome fun. I was to go back and do the other 3 rooms now. We picked Al Capone. First time just two of us. Juan was an amazing host. Hope I spelled that right.

room_title: Escape room "Al Capone’s Revenge" by Xscape Factor in Fayetteville
review: Fun. We are now part of the 11% who xscaped Al Capone’s room! Challenging fun time.

room_title: Escape room "Al Capone’s Revenge" by Xscape Factor in Fayetteville
review: It was really fun! My group did the Al Capone room and we attempted to do it without clues. It was really hard without them so we caved in, but it was super fun! They time you, but continue to let you finish regardless of time so we had a blast. It was definitely less stressful without trying to finish it within the hour.
